english.segment1: Loud against my face. The tired awake. I walked denied. The tombstone swayed. I feel soaked with blood. These all smell my flesh. The crowds are calling. Calling me. The crowds are calling me. These are the lies. They run from this. I cannot look, want to collapse.
english.segment3: My sheltered minds theyre coming down. They come again. Down.
english.segment4: Loud against my face. The tired awake. I walked denied. The tomb swayed.
